name: Gorgonzola Bread
author: CAPTAINMORG
summary: French bread topped with Gorgonzola cheese, sliced pears and walnut pieces makes an elegant appetizer without a lot of work.
ingredients: 1  French baguette, sliced into 1/4 inch rounds
¼ cup olive oil or melted butter
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Arrange the baguette slices in a single layer on a baking sheet
Brush the top of each one with olive oil or melted butter
Place a slice of pear onto each piece of bread, then crumble some of the cheese over the top
Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the pears are browned and the cheese has started to melt
